reviewText: I work in a Dementia type facility, I play this DVD often, its so enjoyable! the Scenery is amazing, and the music is wonderful! full of old songs everyone knows and can sing along with, lots of scenes of familiar happenings, like town parades, and waterfalls, and city life.. just very reminiscent. I love it! My residents adore it.. its all music and scenery, no commentary to distract the eye or the mind.. its very relaxing, I'd definitly purchase it for my own personal movie library.
3 of the selections on the DVD would not play at all. I would not recommend this DVD to anyone else.
Out residents love the music and video.
This DVD does not reflect the diversity of America
This was a gift for a friend she really like it.
the first 5 minutes was great, I expected the remaining of it to be the same, but it was not
Wonderful DVD about what our country was founded on. Everyone should see this DVD!!!
Very satisfied with product.  I purchased it to show in our S.S. class at church but have not done that yet.  It will be very nice for 4th of July.

I let it run while Marilu and I play songs at assisted living centers around the Northern Colorado area. It's always a winner with the folks and I'm glad I bought it. Thanks Reader's Digest and Amazon!

Some of the best music and most beautiful scenery available on DVD.
Great for lobbies, waiting rooms, or home viewing. Excellent for nursing homes and retirement centers.
